articles.title: Reliance Industries block deal: 0.3% equity worth nearly Rs 5,000 crore changes hands - CNBCTV18
articles.description: Reliance Industries is currently among the top losers on the Nifty 50 index after HDFC Bank.  It is also contributing nearly 32 points to the Nifty 50's downside on Wednesday, while HDFC Bank is contributing nearly 90 points.
articles.content: Note To ReadersDisclosure: Network18, the parent company of CNBCTV18.com, is controlled by Independent Media Trust, of which Reliance Industries is the sole beneficiary.
